languages.text: {n}Выстрел из игольного пистолета чудом промахивается мимо головы Инфернус-мастера, снеся половину папиросы. Рядом с вами возникает ткач Кровавой паутины, хрупкий и юный.{/n} "Домин'{name}, отринь поганую длань — в ней предательство и неправедная смерть. Энрих Монтэг — не человек, и он жаждет твоей гибели".
languages.translation_comment: прибегает культист смерти, стреляет мимо инфернуса
прибегает культист смерти, стреляет мимо инфернуса

languages.text: {n}A shot from a needle pistol misses Einrich's head by a thread, cutting his lho-stick in two. A frail young cultist of the Bloodspun Web appears beside you.{/n} "Domin'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds only betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."
languages.original_text: {n}Выстрел из игольного пистолета чудом промахивается мимо головы Инфернус-мастера, снеся половину папиросы. Рядом с вами возникает ткач Кровавой паутины, хрупкий и юный.{/n} "Домин'{name}, отринь поганую длань — в ней предательство и неправедная смерть. Энрих Монтэг — не человек, и он жаждет твоей гибели".

traits.locale_text: {n}A shot from a needle pistol misses the head of the Infernus Master by a thread, cutting his cigarette in two. A frail and young Bloodspun Web weaver appears beside you.{/n} "Enim'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."

{n}A shot from a needle pistol misses the head of the Infernus Master by a thread, cutting his cigarette in two. A frail and young Bloodspun Web weaver appears beside you.{/n} "Enim'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."

A frail young cultist of the Bloodspun Web appears beside you.{/n} "Domin'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds only betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."

{n}A shot from a needle pistol misses Einrich's head by a thread, cutting his lho-stick in two. A frail young cultist of the Bloodspun Web appears beside you.{/n} "Domin'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds only betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."

languages.text: {n}El disparo de una pistola de agujas está a punto de atravesar la cabeza de Einrich, pero solo llega a cortar su cigarrillo por la mitad. Un joven y frágil cultista de la Red Sanguinolenta aparece junto a ti.{/n} «Domin'{name}, rechace la mano del mal, pues solo sostiene traición y muerte injusta. Einrich Monteg no es humano y pretende condenarl{mf|e|a}».
languages.original_text: {n}A shot from a needle pistol misses Einrich's head by a thread, cutting his lho-stick in two. A frail young cultist of the Bloodspun Web appears beside you.{/n} "Domin'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds only betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."

traits.locale_text: {n}El disparo de una pistola de agujas está a punto de atravesar la cabeza de Einrich, pero solo llega a cortar su cigarrillo por la mitad. Un joven y frágil cultista de la Red Sanguinolenta aparece junto a ti.{/n} «Domin'{name}, rechace la mano del mal, pues solo sostiene traición y muerte injusta. Einrich Monteg no es humano y pretende condenarl{mf|e|a}».

languages.text: {n}ニードルピストルから放たれた一発が、アインリッヒの頭をかすめ、アイホスティックを真っ二つにする。弱々しい若いブラッドスパン・ウェブの信者がそばに現れた。{/n}「ドミン・{name}、その邪悪な手を振り払え。その手にあるのは裏切りと不当な死だけだ。アインリッヒ・モンテグは人間ではない。あなたの終焉を狙っている」
languages.original_text: {n}A shot from a needle pistol misses Einrich's head by a thread, cutting his lho-stick in two. A frail young cultist of the Bloodspun Web appears beside you.{/n} "Domin'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds only betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."

traits.locale_text: {n}ニードルピストルから放たれた一発が、アインリッヒの頭をかすめ、アイホスティックを真っ二つにする。弱々しい若いブラッドスパン・ウェブの信者がそばに現れた。{/n}「ドミン・{name}、その邪悪な手を振り払え。その手にあるのは裏切りと不当な死だけだ。アインリッヒ・モンテグは人間ではない。あなたの終焉を狙っている」

languages.text: {n}就在此时，有人用毒针手枪朝艾因里奇开了一枪。毒针从艾因里奇头部旁边划过，将他的麻烟一分为二。一位虚弱的年轻织网者出现在你的身边。{/n}“秘者{name}，快放开那只邪恶的手，它只会带来背叛与不正当的死亡。艾因里奇·蒙特格不是人类，他想要你的命。”
languages.original_text: {n}A shot from a needle pistol misses Einrich's head by a thread, cutting his lho-stick in two. A frail young cultist of the Bloodspun Web appears beside you.{/n} "Domin'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds only betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."

traits.locale_text: {n}就在此时，有人用毒针手枪朝艾因里奇开了一枪。毒针从艾因里奇头部旁边划过，将他的麻烟一分为二。一位虚弱的年轻织网者出现在你的身边。{/n}“秘者{name}，快放开那只邪恶的手，它只会带来背叛与不正当的死亡。艾因里奇·蒙特格不是人类，他想要你的命。”

languages.text: {n}Ein Schuss aus einer Pistole verfehlt Einrichs Kopf nur um Haaresbreite und spaltet seinen Lho-Stab in zwei Hälften. Ein junger Kultist des Blutgesponnenen Netzes tritt neben dich.{/n} "Domin'{name}, widersagt der bösen Hand. Sie bringt Euch nur Verrat und Tod. Einrich Monteg ist kein Mensch, und er will Euren Untergang."
languages.original_text: {n}A shot from a needle pistol misses Einrich's head by a thread, cutting his lho-stick in two. A frail young cultist of the Bloodspun Web appears beside you.{/n} "Domin'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds only betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Schuss aus einer Pistole verfehlt Einrichs Kopf nur um Haaresbreite und spaltet seinen Lho-Stab in zwei Hälften. Ein junger Kultist des Blutgesponnenen Netzes tritt neben dich.{/n} "Domin'{name}, widersagt der bösen Hand. Sie bringt Euch nur Verrat und Tod. Einrich Monteg ist kein Mensch, und er will Euren Untergang."

languages.text: {n}Un tir de pistolet à aiguilles manque de peu la tête d'Einrich et coupe son cigalho en deux. Un jeune cultiste de la Toile de Sang apparaît soudain à vos côtés.{/n} « Domin'{name}, rejetez cette main maléfique qui n'offre rien d'autre que la trahison et la mort. Einrich Monteg n'est pas humain, et il cherche à vous nuire. »
languages.original_text: {n}A shot from a needle pistol misses Einrich's head by a thread, cutting his lho-stick in two. A frail young cultist of the Bloodspun Web appears beside you.{/n} "Domin'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds only betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un tir de pistolet à aiguilles manque de peu la tête d'Einrich et coupe son cigalho en deux. Un jeune cultiste de la Toile de Sang apparaît soudain à vos côtés.{/n} « Domin'{name}, rejetez cette main maléfique qui n'offre rien d'autre que la trahison et la mort. Einrich Monteg n'est pas humain, et il cherche à vous nuire. »

languages.text: {n}Bir iğne tabancasından çıkan mermi, Einrich'in başını teğet geçip liho dalını ikiye bölüyor. Kanipi Ağı'na mensup genç ve çelimsiz bir tarikatçı yanınızda beliriyor.{/n} "Domin'{name}, kötünün elini ters çeviresiniz. O ancak ihanet eder ve haksız ölüm getirir. Einrich Monteg insan değildir, başınıza felaket getirmek ister."
languages.original_text: {n}A shot from a needle pistol misses Einrich's head by a thread, cutting his lho-stick in two. A frail young cultist of the Bloodspun Web appears beside you.{/n} "Domin'{name}, cast off the evil hand — it holds only betrayal and wrongful death. Einrich Monteg is not human, and he seeks your demise."
